text:
Primarily, not using 'jet' in these two examples.

Also: a call to `plotting.show()` was raising an error in plot_probabilistic*
so this fixes that.

I requested some cosmetic changes. Otherwise, +1, this really improves the example indeed.
That was fast. LGTM too, merging.
We use `plotting.show()` on purpose. In a lot of examples, this allows the user to display the plot without importing explicitely pyplot. We'd like to keep it this way.
